department.dept_long_name: Department of Stem Cell and Regenerative Biology

course.title: Human Developmental and Regenerative Biology
course.meeting_text: M., W., F., at 1, and a weekly section to be arranged
course.faculty_text: Kevin C. Eggan and William J. Anderson
course.description: Fundamental concepts in developmental biology will be presented within the framework of the developing and regenerating mammal. Where possible, lectures will focus on humans.
course.prerequisites: Concurrent enrollment in Life and Physical Sciences A or Life Sciences 1a.
course.notes: This course, when taken for a letter grade, meets the General Education requirement for Science of Living Systems.
